stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 installed trojan program. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Do 1 core damage.
text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 installed trojan program. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage.
title: Bumi 1.0
